column1: 21318,Uncanny X-Men (1963) #499,499,81069,11,"X-Men: Divided We Stand comes to its shocking conclusion!  Cyclops and Emma come face to face against former allies.,2008,6
Colossus, Wolverine and Nightcrawler scramble to get out of Russia alive. Witness the new status quo for the X-Men that will define their future!
